con:request.name: SO Create
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22" xmlns:urn="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v2_0" xmlns:urn1="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v2_0" xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0" xmlns:urn3="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:debtor:v2_0" xmlns:urn4="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:creditor:v2_0">\r <soapenv:Header>\r <wsc:AutHeader>\r <wsc:SourceApplication>${#TestSuite#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication>\r <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication>\r <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function>\r <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version>\r <wsc:ClientContext>\r <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid>\r <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials>\r <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel>\r <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid>\r <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid>\r <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip>\r <wsc:item key="Employee" value="${Properties#UserID}"/>\r <wsc:item key="SelfService" value="false"/>\r <wsc:item key="AgreementId" value="${Properties#AgreementId}"/>\r <wsc:item key="PaymentChannel" value="${Properties#PaymentChannel_BM}"/>\r <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="${=java.util.UUID.randomUUID()}"/>\r </wsc:ClientContext>\r </wsc:AutHeader>\r </soapenv:Header>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <urn:standingOrderCreateRequest>\r <urn:standingOrder>\r <urn1:recurrence>BIWEEKLY</urn1:recurrence>\r <urn1:dueDates>\r <!--1 or more repetitions:-->\r <urn1:dueDate>${Properties#DueDate}</urn1:dueDate>\r </urn1:dueDates>\r <urn1:bankHolidayAdjustment>BEFORE</urn1:bankHolidayAdjustment>\r <urn1:exemptions>\r <!--1 or more repetitions:-->\r <urn1:exemption>\r <urn1:startDate>${Properties#ExceptionStartDate}</urn1:startDate>\r <urn1:endDate>${Properties#ExceptionEndDate}</urn1:endDate>\r <urn1:recurring>false</urn1:recurring>\r <urn1:description>DescriptionOneExemption</urn1:description>\r </urn1:exemption>\r </urn1:exemptions>\r <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->\r <urn1:paymentInfo>\r <urn3:paymentTypeInformation>\r <urn3:instructionPriority>NORM</urn3:instructionPriority>\r <urn3:serviceLevel>URGP</urn3:serviceLevel>\r </urn3:paymentTypeInformation>\r <urn3:debtorAccount>\r <urn2:identification>${Properties#accountNumber}</urn2:identification>\r <urn2:currency>${Properties#currencyCode}</urn2:currency>\r </urn3:debtorAccount>\r </urn1:paymentInfo>\r <!--1 or more repetitions:-->\r <urn1:transaction>\r <urn4:amount>\r <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->\r <urn2:instructedAmount currency="${Properties#currencyCode}">\r <urn2:amount>${Properties#Amount}</urn2:amount>\r </urn2:instructedAmount>\r </urn4:amount>\r <urn4:chargeBearer>DEBT</urn4:chargeBearer>\r <urn4:creditorAgent>\r <urn2:bic>${Properties#CreditorAgent}</urn2:bic>\r <urn2:name>cred</urn2:name>\r <urn2:postalAddress>\r <urn2:postCode>4502</urn2:postCode>\r <urn2:townName>test</urn2:townName>\r <urn2:countrySubDivision>test</urn2:countrySubDivision>\r <urn2:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country>\r <!--0 to 7 repetitions:-->\r </urn2:postalAddress>\r </urn4:creditorAgent>\r <urn4:creditor>\r <urn2:name>Cred</urn2:name>\r <urn2:postalAddress>\r <urn2:postCode>2121</urn2:postCode>\r <urn2:townName>test</urn2:townName>\r <urn2:countrySubDivision>test</urn2:countrySubDivision>\r <urn2:country>NO</urn2:country>\r </urn2:postalAddress>\r </urn4:creditor>\r <urn4:creditorAccount>\r <urn2:identification>${Properties#CreditAccountNumber}</urn2:identification>\r <urn2:currency>${Properties#CreditorCurrency}</urn2:currency>\r </urn4:creditorAccount>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <urn4:remittanceInformationUnstructured>ISPC</urn4:remittanceInformationUnstructured>\r </urn1:transaction>\r <urn1:standingOrderType>PERIODIC</urn1:standingOrderType>\r </urn:standingOrder>\r </urn:standingOrderCreateRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: SO_Create_V2_1
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22" xmlns:urn="urn:srv.stord.fs.tietoevry.com:ws:standingorder:v2_1" xmlns:urn1="urn:srv.stord.fs.tietoevry.com:domain:standingorder:v2_1" xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_1" xmlns:urn3="urn:srv.stord.fs.tietoevry.com:domain:debtor:v2_1" xmlns:urn4="urn:srv.stord.fs.tietoevry.com:domain:creditor:v2_1">\r <soapenv:Header>\r <wsc:AutHeader>\r <wsc:SourceApplication>${#TestSuite#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication>\r <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication>\r <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function>\r <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version>\r <wsc:ClientContext>\r <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid>\r <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials>\r <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel>\r <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid>\r <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid>\r <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip>\r <wsc:item key="Employee" value="${Properties#UserID}"/>\r <wsc:item key="SelfService" value="false"/>\r <wsc:item key="PaymentChannel" value="${Properties#PaymentChannel_BM}"/>\r <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="${=java.util.UUID.randomUUID()}"/>\r </wsc:ClientContext>\r </wsc:AutHeader>\r </soapenv:Header>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <urn:standingOrderCreateRequest>\r <urn:standingOrder>\r <urn1:recurrence>WEEKLY</urn1:recurrence>\r <urn1:dueDates>\r <!--1 or more repetitions:-->\r <urn1:dueDate>${Properties#DueDate}</urn1:dueDate>\r </urn1:dueDates>\r <urn1:bankHolidayAdjustment>BEFORE</urn1:bankHolidayAdjustment>\r <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->\r <urn1:paymentInfo>\r <urn3:paymentTypeInformation>\r <urn3:instructionPriority>NORM</urn3:instructionPriority>\r <urn3:categoryPurpose>SUPP</urn3:categoryPurpose>\r </urn3:paymentTypeInformation>\r <urn3:debtorAccount>\r <urn2:identification>${Properties#accountNumber}</urn2:identification>\r <urn2:currency>${Properties#currencyCode}</urn2:currency>\r </urn3:debtorAccount>\r <urn3:debtor>\r <urn2:id>\r <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->\r <urn2:OrgId>\r <urn2:Id>${Properties#orgid}</urn2:Id>\r </urn2:OrgId>\r </urn2:id>\r </urn3:debtor>\r </urn1:paymentInfo>\r <!--1 or more repetitions:-->\r <urn1:transaction>\r <urn4:amount>\r <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->\r <urn2:instructedAmount currency="${Properties#currencyCode}">\r <urn2:amount>${Properties#Amount}</urn2:amount>\r </urn2:instructedAmount>\r </urn4:amount>\r <urn4:chargeBearer>DEBT</urn4:chargeBearer>\r <urn4:creditor>\r <urn2:name>Name</urn2:name>\r <urn2:postalAddress>\r <urn2:addressType>HOME</urn2:addressType>\r <urn2:country>NO</urn2:country>\r <!--0 to 7 repetitions:-->\r </urn2:postalAddress>\r </urn4:creditor>\r <urn4:creditorAccount>\r <urn2:identification>${Properties#CreditAccountNumber}</urn2:identification>\r <urn2:currency>${Properties#CreditorCurrency}</urn2:currency>\r </urn4:creditorAccount>\r <urn4:ultimateCreditor>\r <urn2:postalAddress>\r <urn2:addressType>HOME</urn2:addressType>\r <urn2:country>NO</urn2:country>\r <!--0 to 7 repetitions:-->\r </urn2:postalAddress>\r </urn4:ultimateCreditor>\r </urn1:transaction>\r <urn1:standingOrderType>PERIODIC</urn1:standingOrderType>\r <urn1:chargesRequired>false</urn1:chargesRequired>\r </urn:standingOrder>\r </urn:standingOrderCreateRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: SO_Confirm_V2_1

declare namespace ns3='urn:srv.stord.fs.tietoevry.com:ws:standingorder:v2_1'; //ns3:standingOrderCreateResponse[1]/ns3:standingOrderKey[1]/ns2:agreementId[1]}</urn1:agreementId>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn1:agreementVersion>${SO_Create_V2_1#Response#declare namespace ns2='urn:srv.stord.fs.tietoevry.com:domain:standingorder:v2_1'; declare namespace ns3='urn:srv.stord.fs.tietoevry.com:ws:standingorder:v2_1'; //ns3:standingOrderCreateResponse[1]/ns3:standingOrderKey[1]/ns2:agreementVersion[1]}</urn1:agreementVersion>\r </urn:standingOrderKey>\r <urn:standingOrderAction>CONFIRM</urn:standingOrderAction>\r </urn:standingOrderStatusUpdateRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: SO_Verify_V2_1
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22" xmlns:urn="urn:srv.stord.fs.tietoevry.com:ws:standingorder:v2_1" xmlns:urn1="urn:srv.stord.fs.tietoevry.com:domain:standingorder:v2_1"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${#TestSuite#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item key="Employee" value="${Properties#UserID}"/> <wsc:item key="SelfService" value="false"/> <wsc:item key="PaymentChannel" value="${Properties#PaymentChannel_BM}"/> <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="${=java.util.UUID.randomUUID()}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:standingOrderStatusUpdateRequest> <urn:standingOrderKey> <urn1:agreementId>${SO_Create_V2_1#Response#declare namespace ns2='urn:srv.stord.fs.tietoevry.com:domain:standingorder:v2_1'; con:request.name: SO_Update_V2_1
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22" xmlns:urn="urn:srv.stord.fs.tietoevry.com:ws:standingorder:v2_1" xmlns:urn1="urn:srv.stord.fs.tietoevry.com:domain:standingorder:v2_1" xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_1" xmlns:urn3="urn:srv.stord.fs.tietoevry.com:domain:debtor:v2_1" xmlns:urn4="urn:srv.stord.fs.tietoevry.com:domain:creditor:v2_1">\r <soapenv:Header>\r <wsc:AutHeader>\r <wsc:SourceApplication>${#TestSuite#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication>\r <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication>\r key="AgreementId" value="${Properties#AgreementId}"/>\r <wsc:item key="PaymentChannel" value="${Properties#PaymentChannel_BM}"/>\r <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="${=java.util.UUID.randomUUID()}"/>\r </wsc:ClientContext>\r </wsc:AutHeader>\r </soapenv:Header>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <urn:standingOrderUpdateRequest>\r <urn:standingOrder>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn1:recurrence>WEEKLY</urn1:recurrence>\r <urn1:dueDates>\r <urn1:dueDate>${= java.time.LocalDateTime.now().format(java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern('yyyy-MM-dd'))}</urn1:dueDate>\r </urn1:dueDates>\r <urn1:bankHolidayAdjustment>BEFORE</urn1:bankHolidayAdjustment>\r <urn1:exemptions>\r <urn1:exemption>\r <urn1:startDate>${= java.time.LocalDateTime.now().plusDays(10).format(java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern('yyyy-MM-dd'))}</urn1:startDate>\r <urn1:endDate>${= java.time.LocalDateTime.now().plusDays(15).format(java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern('yyyy-MM-dd'))}</urn1:endDate>\r <urn1:recurring>false</urn1:recurring>\r </urn1:exemption>\r </urn1:exemptions>\r <urn1:paymentInfo>\r <urn3:debtorAccount>\r <urn2:identification>${Properties#accountNumber}</urn2:identification>\r <urn2:currency>${Properties#currencyCode}</urn2:currency>\r </urn3:debtorAccount>\r </urn1:paymentInfo>\r <urn1:transaction>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn4:amount>\r <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->\r <urn2:instructedAmount currency="NOK">\r <urn2:amount>2</urn2:amount>\r </urn2:instructedAmount>\r </urn4:amount>\r <urn4:chargeBearer>DEBT</urn4:chargeBearer>\r <urn4:creditor>\r <urn2:name>SO Cred</urn2:name>\r <urn2:postalAddress>\r <urn2:postCode>45022</urn2:postCode>\r <urn2:townName>test</urn2:townName>\r <urn2:countrySubDivision>test</urn2:countrySubDivision>\r <urn2:country>NO</urn2:country>\r <urn2:addressLine>asdfasdfs</urn2:addressLine>\r </urn2:postalAddress>\r </urn4:creditor>\r <urn4:creditorAccount>\r <urn2:identification>${Properties#CreditAccountNumber}</urn2:identification>\r <!--Optional:-->\r </urn4:creditorAccount>\r </urn1:transaction>\r <urn1:standingOrderKey>\r <urn1:agreementId>${SO_Create_V2_1#Response#declare namespace ns2='urn:srv.stord.fs.tietoevry.com:domain:standingorder:v2_1'; declare namespace ns3='urn:srv.stord.fs.tietoevry.com:ws:standingorder:v2_1'; //ns3:standingOrderCreateResponse[1]/ns3:standingOrderKey[1]/ns2:agreementId[1]}</urn1:agreementId>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn1:agreementVersion>${SO_Create_V2_1#Response#declare namespace ns2='urn:srv.stord.fs.tietoevry.com:domain:standingorder:v2_1'; declare namespace ns3='urn:srv.stord.fs.tietoevry.com:ws:standingorder:v2_1'; //ns3:standingOrderCreateResponse[1]/ns3:standingOrderKey[1]/ns2:agreementVersion[1]}</urn1:agreementVersion>\r </urn1:standingOrderKey>\r <urn1:standingOrderType>PERIODIC</urn1:standingOrderType>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn1:chargesRequired>false</urn1:chargesRequired>\r </urn:standingOrder>\r </urn:standingOrderUpdateRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22" xmlns:urn="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v2_0" xmlns:urn1="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v2_0" xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0" xmlns:urn3="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:debtor:v2_0" xmlns:urn4="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:creditor:v2_0">\r <soapenv:Header>\r <wsc:AutHeader>\r <wsc:SourceApplication>${#TestSuite#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication>\r <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication>\r <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function>\r <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version>\r <wsc:ClientContext>\r <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid>\r <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials>\r <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel>\r <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid>\r <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid>\r <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip>\r <wsc:item key="Employee" value="${Properties#UserID}"/>\r <wsc:item key="SelfService" value="false"/>\r <wsc:item key="AgreementId" value="${Properties#AgreementId}"/>\r <wsc:item key="PaymentChannel" value="${Properties#PaymentChannel_BM}"/>\r <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="${=java.util.UUID.randomUUID()}"/>\r </wsc:ClientContext>\r </wsc:AutHeader>\r </soapenv:Header>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <urn:standingOrderUpdateRequest>\r <urn:standingOrder>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn1:recurrence>WEEKLY</urn1:recurrence>\r <urn1:dueDates>\r <urn1:dueDate>${= java.time.LocalDateTime.now().format(java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern('yyyy-MM-dd'))}</urn1:dueDate>\r </urn1:dueDates>\r <urn1:bankHolidayAdjustment>BEFORE</urn1:bankHolidayAdjustment>\r <urn1:exemptions>\r <urn1:exemption>\r <urn1:startDate>${= java.time.LocalDateTime.now().plusDays(10).format(java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern('yyyy-MM-dd'))}</urn1:startDate>\r <urn1:endDate>${= java.time.LocalDateTime.now().plusDays(15).format(java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern('yyyy-MM-dd'))}</urn1:endDate>\r <urn1:recurring>false</urn1:recurring>\r </urn1:exemption>\r </urn1:exemptions>\r <urn1:paymentInfo>\r <urn3:debtorAccount>\r <urn2:identification>${Properties#accountNumber}</urn2:identification>\r <urn2:currency>${Properties#currencyCode}</urn2:currency>\r </urn3:debtorAccount>\r </urn1:paymentInfo>\r <urn1:transaction>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn4:amount>\r <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->\r <urn2:instructedAmount currency="NOK">\r <urn2:amount>2</urn2:amount>\r </urn2:instructedAmount>\r </urn4:amount>\r <urn4:chargeBearer>DEBT</urn4:chargeBearer>\r <urn4:creditor>\r <urn2:name>SO Cred</urn2:name>\r <urn2:postalAddress>\r <urn2:postCode>45022</urn2:postCode>\r <urn2:townName>test</urn2:townName>\r <urn2:countrySubDivision>test</urn2:countrySubDivision>\r <urn2:country>NO</urn2:country>\r <urn2:addressLine>asdfasdfs</urn2:addressLine>\r </urn2:postalAddress>\r </urn4:creditor>\r <urn4:creditorAccount>\r <urn2:identification>${Properties#CreditAccountNumber}</urn2:identification>\r <!--Optional:-->\r </urn4:creditorAccount>\r </urn1:transaction>\r <urn1:standingOrderKey>\r <urn1:agreementId>${SO_Create_V2_1#Response#declare namespace ns2='urn:srv.stord.fs.tietoevry.com:domain:standingorder:v2_1'; declare namespace ns3='urn:srv.stord.fs.tietoevry.com:ws:standingorder:v2_1'; //ns3:standingOrderCreateResponse[1]/ns3:standingOrderKey[1]/ns2:agreementId[1]}</urn1:agreementId>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn1:agreementVersion>${SO_Create_V2_1#Response#declare namespace ns2='urn:srv.stord.fs.tietoevry.com:domain:standingorder:v2_1'; declare namespace ns3='urn:srv.stord.fs.tietoevry.com:ws:standingorder:v2_1'; //ns3:standingOrderCreateResponse[1]/ns3:standingOrderKey[1]/ns2:agreementVersion[1]}</urn1:agreementVersion>\r </urn1:standingOrderKey>\r <urn1:standingOrderType>PERIODIC</urn1:standingOrderType>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn1:chargesRequired>false</urn1:chargesRequired>\r </urn:standingOrder>\r </urn:standingOrderUpdateRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
